LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupSimple.label: uncooked simple soup
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupSimple.description: An uncooked simple soup. This needs to be cooked in an electric pot to be edible.
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupSimple.label: simple soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupSimple.description: A simple soup slow cooked from a few ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupFine.label: uncooked fine soup
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupFine.description: An uncooked fine soup. This needs to be cooked in an electric pot to be edible.
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupFine.label: fine soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupFine.description: A complex soup assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupLavish.label: uncooked lavish soup
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupLavish.description: An uncooked lavish soup. This needs to be cooked in an electric pot to be edible.
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupLavish.label: lavish soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupLavish.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this soup nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupGourmet.label: uncooked gourmet soup
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedSoupGourmet.description: An uncooked gourmet soup. This needs to be cooked in an electric pot to be edible.
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupGourmet.label: gourmet soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookedSoupGourmet.description: A culinary work of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity soup.
